tool_description: Estimates recovery time objectives (RTO) and recovery point objectives (RPO) based on backup characteristics, system specifications, and historical recovery performance data.

backup_size_gb.description: Size of backup to recover in gigabytes

backup_type.description: Type of backup (full, differential, incremental, log)

storage_type.description: Storage medium (ssd, hdd, tape, cloud, network)

network_bandwidth_mbps.description: Available network bandwidth in megabits per second

target_system_cpu_cores.description: Number of CPU cores on target recovery system

target_system_ram_gb.description: Available RAM on target system in gigabytes

compression_ratio.description: Backup compression ratio (1.0 = no compression, 2.0 = 50% compressed)

parallel_streams.description: Number of parallel recovery streams to use

include_verification.description: Whether to include verification time in estimates

historical_performance_factor.description: Performance adjustment factor based on historical data

error_messages: Invalid backup size: backup_size_gb must be a positive number.
Invalid backup type: Use one of [full, differential, incremental, log].
Invalid storage type: Use one of [ssd, hdd, tape, cloud, network].
Invalid bandwidth: network_bandwidth_mbps must be positive.
Invalid system specs: CPU cores must be positive integer, RAM must be positive number.
Invalid compression ratio: Must be between 0.1 and 10.0.
Invalid parallel streams: Must be between 1 and 32.
Invalid performance factor: Must be between 0.1 and 5.0.
usage: Provide backup characteristics and target system specifications. Adjust compression_ratio, parallel_streams, and historical_performance_factor based on your environment for more accurate estimates.

estimated_rto_minutes.description: Estimated Recovery Time Objective in minutes

estimated_rpo_minutes.description: Estimated Recovery Point Objective in minutes

transfer_time_minutes.description: Estimated time to transfer backup data

restoration_time_minutes.description: Estimated time to restore and apply backup

confidence_level.description: Confidence level of estimates (high, medium, low)
